title: Distributing the negative sign
text: The first step is to distribute the negative sign to remove parentheses. $$12x^2+3x-8x^2-19$$ $$=$$ $$12x^2+3x-8x^2+19$$
speech: The first step is to distribute the negative sign to remove parentheses.  12 x squared, plus 3 x minus 8 x squared, minus 19   is equal to   12 x squared, plus 3 x minus 8 x squared, plus 19
pacedSpeech: The first step is to distribute the negative sign to remove parentheses.   12 x squared, plus 3 x minus 8 x squared, minus 19
12 x squared, plus 3 x minus 8 x squared, plus 19

title: Grouping like terms
text: The next step is to group like terms. $$12x^2+3x-8x^2+19$$ $$=$$ $$12x^2-8x^2+3x+19$$
speech: The next step is to group like terms.  12 x squared, plus 3 x minus 8 x squared, plus 19   is equal to   12 x squared, minus 8 x squared, plus 3 x plus 19
pacedSpeech: The next step is to group like terms.   12 x squared, plus 3 x minus 8 x squared, plus 19
12 x squared, minus 8 x squared, plus 3 x plus 19

title: Combining and simplifying
speech: Finally, simplify the expression.  12 x squared, minus 8 x squared, plus 3 x plus 19   is equal to   4 x squared, plus 3 x plus 19
pacedSpeech: Finally, simplify the expression.   12 x squared, minus 8 x squared, plus 3 x plus 19
